name: IRFPAI_CLINICAL_INFO
description: This table contains clinical information collected on the IRF-PAI.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the abstraction for this row.

columns.name: IMPAIRMENT_GROUP_ADMSN_C
columns.description: The code that best describes the primary reason for admission to the rehab facility.

columns.name: IMPAIRMENT_GROUP_DISCHRG_C
columns.description: The code that best describes the primary impairment throughout the stay. If the patient develops a more resource-intensive impairment during the stay, this element could be different from the admission element.

columns.name: EATING_ADMSN_C
columns.description: Eating assessment at Admission, scored using Functional Independence Measure (FIM) levels 1-7.

columns.name: EATING_DISCHRG_C
columns.description: Eating assessment at Discharge, scored using Functional Independence Measure (FIM) levels 1-7.

columns.name: EATING_GOAL_C
columns.description: Goal for Eating assessment, scored using Functional Independence Measure (FIM) levels 1-7.

columns.name: GROOMING_ADMSN_C
columns.description: Grooming assessment at Admission, scored using Functional Independence Measure (FIM) levels 1-7.

columns.description: Grooming assessment at Discharge, scored using Functional Independence Measure (FIM) levels 1-7.

columns.name: GROOMING_GOAL_C
columns.description: Goal for Grooming assessment, scored using Functional Independence Measure (FIM) levels 1-7.

columns.name: FIRST_INTERRUPTION_START_DATE
columns.description: The date of the first interruption to the inpatient rehabilitation facility (IRF) stay.

columns.name: FIRST_INTERRUPTION_END_DATE
columns.description: The date of the patient's return from the first interruption to the inpatient rehabilitation facility (IRF) stay.

columns.name: SECOND_INTERRUPTION_START_DATE
columns.description: The date of the second interruption to the inpatient rehabilitation facility (IRF) stay.

columns.name: SECOND_INTERRUPTION_END_DATE
columns.description: The date of the patient's return from the second interruption to the inpatient rehabilitation facility (IRF) stay.

columns.name: THIRD_INTERRUPTION_START_DATE
columns.description: The date of the third interruption to the inpatient rehabilitation facility (IRF) stay.

columns.name: THIRD_INTERRUPTION_END_DATE
columns.description: The date of the patient's return from the third interruption to the inpatient rehabilitation facility (IRF) stay.
